A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A director\, and therefore a movie\, that mistakes contrivance for originality. True Star Wars fans have a right to be angry. Nearly every critic's review I read claims that fans are essentially sulking because they are disappointed that the movie didn't give them what they wanted. In a way\, they are right. True fans wanted a Star Wars movie\, but that wasn't what Disney\, Katherine Kennedy\, or Rian Johnson delivered. What a waste.
